tagline: Integration of Font Awesome with JQuery mobile
body: fa4jqm ====== This is my attempt at integrating FontAwesome with JQuery mobile 1.4. To use it in your project, copy fa-icons.css in your css directory, the fontawesome font files in your css/fonts directory, Add reference to fa-icons.css either in your html files: ```html ``` or in another css file: ```css @import "fa-icons.css"; ``` To use an awesome icon instead of a standard jquery mobile icon on an element, instead of attributing the class ui-icon-<icon-name> to the element, add both fa and fa-<icon-name> classes to the element. For instance, instead of using: ```html Next ``` use: ```html Next ```
